answers.answer: Foreign nationals from Ukraine under temporary protection benefit from medical services, medical supplies, medicines, medical devices, and medical services included in the national curative health programs.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/sanatate and read the section under 'My rights Temporary protection & Short stay'.

answers.answer: Foreign nationals from Ukraine can access medical services without paying contributions to the social health insurance system, personal contributions for outpatient medicines, and with exemption from co-payment.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/sanatate and read the section under 'My rights Temporary protection & Short stay'.

answers.answer: As an asylum seeker, you have the right to receive free basic medical assistance and treatment, emergency medical assistance in a hospital, and free medical treatment for acute/chronic illnesses that put your life at immediate risk.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/sanatate and read the section under 'Asylum seeker'.

answers.answer: If an asylum seeker has special medical needs, they have the right to receive proper medical care based on their specific condition.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/sanatate and read the section under 'Asylum seeker'.

answers.answer: The Romanian social health insurance system grants refugees from Ukraine rights such as consultation of a family doctor, a narrow specialist, pregnancy monitoring, access to free laboratories, and dental services.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/sanatate and read the section under 'Medical assistance to refugees from Ukraine in Romania'.

answers.answer: The Women's Center offers support in accessing reproductive health services including contraception, breastfeeding, prevention of sexually transmitted diseases, pregnancy monitoring, and abortion.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/sanatate and read the section under 'Women's Center'.

answers.answer: The Women's Center offers services dedicated to victims of domestic violence.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/sanatate and read the section under 'Women's Center'.

answers.answer: Parents, relatives, or friends of a Ukrainian child with cancer needing medical assistance can access Ukraine Child Cancer Help.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/sanatate and read the section under 'Pediatric oncology'.

answers.answer: People living with HIV in Romania can access psycho-medical-social services through consilierehiv.ro.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/sanatate and read the section under 'Counseling for people living with HIV'.

answers.answer: Individuals coming from Ukraine can receive HIV treatment or services by contacting the Sens Pozitiv Call center at +40 744 682 225.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/sanatate and read the section under 'Call center Sens Pozitiv'.

answers.answer: Support is available from the National Alliance for Rare Diseases Romania, which provides guidance, and the NoRo center in Zalău, offering free therapy for Ukrainian children.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/sanatate and read the section under 'Help for people with rare or chronic diseases'.

answers.answer: Refugees from Ukraine can find free medical care, including specialist consultations and some medical services, online or offline.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/sanatate and read the section under 'Free medical care for people fleeing the war in Ukraine'.

answers.answer: SECS facilitates access to gynecological consultations, ultrasounds, abortions, IUD insertion/removal, other gynecology services, emergency contraception, and birth control pills.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/sanatate and read the section under 'The Society for Education on Contraception and Sexuality (SECS)'.

answers.answer: The children's nutrition section emphasizes the necessity of breastfeeding or a balanced diet for well-being and immunity, and provides tips for organizing food and food stocks efficiently.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/sanatate and read the section under 'Children’s health. Health services for children. Children’s nutrition'.

answers.answer: Vaccination helps preserve children's health and life by protecting against infectious diseases like measles, rubella, polio, diphtheria, and hepatitis B, which can spread quickly and threaten a child.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/sanatate and read the section under 'Vaccination'.

answers.answer: The section on psychological support for children addresses feelings of danger, anxiety, disruption, and constant changes due to war, suggesting that parental presence and health can provide psychological comfort.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/sanatate and read the section under 'Psychological support for children'.
